explanation: [0-0] In a room, a man in a black T-shirt sits at a table. In front of him is a toy, on which he rests his chin. He holds the yellow levers extending from both sides of the toy with his thumbs and index fingers, one lever on each side. The purple hand of the toy holds an egg yolk.
[0-2] The man in the black T-shirt turns the yellow levers and, with surprise, lifts his chin from the toy.
[0-2] The man in the black T-shirt turns the yellow levers and, with surprise, lifts his chin from the toy.

[2-4] Afterwards, the scene changes to a man in a navy blue T-shirt sitting at the table. He rests his chin on the toy, holding the yellow levers extending from both sides of the toy with his thumbs and index fingers, one lever on each side. The purple hand of the toy holds two egg yolks. Then, the man turns the yellow levers and looks upwards with a smile.
